verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> words דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David הָאַֽחֲרֹנִ֑ים <WH314> Now these [be] the last נְאֻ֧ם <WH5002> said דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> David בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשַׁ֗י <WH3448> of Jesse וּנְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> said הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> and the man הֻ֣קַם <WH6965> [who was] raised up עָ֔ל <WH5920> on high מְשִׁ֙יחַ֙ <WH4899> the anointed אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וּנְעִ֖ים <WH5273> and the sweet זְמִר֥וֹת <WH2158> psalmist יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> The Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> spake בִּ֑י וּמִלָּת֖וֹ <WH4405> by me and his word עַל־ <WH5921> was on לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <WH3956> [was] in my tongue

אָמַר֙ <WH559> said אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> The God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִ֥י דִבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> spake צ֣וּר <WH6697> the Rock יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מוֹשֵׁל֙ <WH4910> to me He that ruleth בָּאָדָ֔ם <WH120> over men צַדִּ֕יק <WH6662> [must be] just מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> ruling יִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> in the fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וּכְא֥וֹר <WH216> And [he shall be] as the light בֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> of the morning יִזְרַח־ <WH2224> riseth שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> [when] the sun בֹּ֚קֶר <WH1242> [even] a morning לֹ֣א <WH3808> without עָב֔וֹת <WH5645> clouds מִנֹּ֥גַהּ <WH5051> by clear shining מִמָּטָ֖ר <WH4306> after rain דֶּ֥שֶׁא <WH1877> [as] the tender grass מֵאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> [springing] out of the earth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Truly לֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֥ן <WH3651> so בֵּיתִ֖י <WH1004> Although my house עִם־ <WH5973> with אֵ֑ל <WH410> [be] not so with God כִּי֩ <WH3588> indeed בְרִ֨ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָ֜ם <WH5769> with me an everlasting שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> yet he hath made לִ֗י עֲרוּכָ֤ה <WH6186> ordered בַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all וּשְׁמֻרָ֔ה <WH8104> in all [things] and sure כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed כָל־ <WH3605> things יִשְׁעִ֥י <WH3468> for [this is] all my salvation וְכָל־ <WH3605> for all חֵ֖פֶץ <WH2656> and all [my] desire כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed לֹ֥א <WH3808> make not יַצְמִֽיחַ׃ <WH6779> although he make [it] not to grow

וּבְלִיַּ֕עַל <WH1100> But [the sons] of Belial כְּק֥וֹץ <WH6975> [shall be] all of them as thorns מֻנָ֖ד <WH5074> thrust away כֻּלָּ֑הַם <WH3605> every כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot בְיָ֖ד <WH3027> with hands יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> because they cannot be taken

וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> But the man יִגַּ֣ע <WH5060> [that] shall touch בָּהֶ֔ם יִמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> them must be fenced בַרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> with iron וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> and the staff חֲנִ֑ית <WH2595> of a spear וּבָאֵ֕שׁ <WH784> with fire שָׂר֥וֹף <WH8313> and they shall be utterly יִשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> burned בַּשָּֽׁבֶת׃ <WH7675> in the [same] place פ

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> These [be] the names הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <WH1368> of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> whom David יֹשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> that sat בַּשֶּׁ֜בֶת <WH7675> place תַּחְכְּמֹנִ֣י ׀ <WH8461> had The Tachmonite רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> chief הַשָּׁלִשִׁ֗י <WH7991> among the captains ה֚וּא <WH1931> he עֲדִינ֣וֹ <WH5722> the same [was] Adino [הָעֶצְנֹו כ] (הָֽעֶצְנִ֔י <WH6112> Eznite ק) עַל־ <WH5921> because שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> [he lift up his spear] against eight מֵא֛וֹת <WH3967> hundred חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> whom he slew בְּפַ֥עַם <WH6471> time [אֶחָד כ] (אֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> a ק) ס

[וְאַחֲרֹו כ] (וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> after that ק) אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son [דֹּדִי כ] (דֹּדֹ֖ו <WH1734> Dodo ק) בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחֹחִ֑י <WH266> the Ahohite בִּשְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> [one] of the three [גִּבֹּרִים כ] (הַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <WH1368> champion ק) עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> with David בְּחָֽרְפָ֤ם <WH2778> when they defied בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּים <WH6430> the Philistines נֶאֶסְפוּ־ <WH622> [that] were there gathered together שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to battle וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> were gone away אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

ה֣וּא <WH1931> He קָם֩ <WH6965> He arose וַיַּ֨ךְ <WH5221> and smote בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> the Philistines עַ֣ד ׀ <WH5704> against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> until יָגְעָ֣ה <WH3021> was weary יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand וַתִּדְבַּ֤ק <WH1692> clave יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> and his hand אֶל־ <WH413> to הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> unto the sword וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> wrought יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH8668> victory גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> a great בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְהָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and the people יָשֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> returned אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> after אַךְ־ <WH389> only לְפַשֵּֽׁט׃ <WH6584> him only to spoil ס

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> And after שַׁמָּ֥א <WH8037> Shamma בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָגֵ֖א <WH89> of Agee הָרָרִ֑י <WH2043> the Hararite וַיֵּאָסְפ֨וּ <WH622> were gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> And the Philistines לַחַיָּ֗ה <WH2416> into a troop וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> where חֶלְקַ֤ת <WH2513> where was a piece הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <WH4395> fruit עֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH5742> of lentiles וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and the people נָ֖ס <WH5127> fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> the Philistines

וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֤ב <WH3320> But he stood בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> in the midst הַֽחֶלְקָה֙ <WH2513> of the ground וַיַּצִּילֶ֔הָ <WH5337> and defended וַיַּ֖ךְ <WH5221> it and slew אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> wrought יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH8668> victory גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> a great ס

וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <WH3381> went down [שְׁלֹשִׁים כ] (שְׁלֹשָׁ֜ה <WH7970> of the thirty ק) מֵהַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> of the thirty רֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> chief וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> in קָצִיר֙ <WH7105> in the harvest time אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> to David אֶל־ <WH413> to מְעָרַ֖ת <WH4631> unto the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <WH5725> of Adullam וְחַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and the troop פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <WH2583> pitched בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David אָ֣ז <WH227> was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <WH4686> [was] then in an hold וּמַצַּ֣ב <WH4673> and the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines אָ֖ז <WH227> was then בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> [was] then [in] Bethlehem

וַיִּתְאַוֶּ֥ה <WH183> longed דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said מִ֚י <WH4310> Oh יַשְׁקֵ֣נִי <WH8248> Oh that one would give me drink מַ֔יִם <WH4325> of the water מִבֹּ֥אר <WH877> the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> which [is] by the gate

וַיִּבְקְעוּ֩ <WH1234> brake through שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> And the three הַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <WH1368> mighty men בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <WH7579> and drew מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> water מִבֹּ֤אר <WH877> the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> that [was] by the gate וַיִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> and took וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <WH935> [it] and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> [it] to David וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not אָבָה֙ <WH14> nevertheless he would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֔ם <WH8354> not drink וַיַּסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> thereof but poured it out אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> And he said חָלִילָה֩ <WH2486> Be it far לִּ֨י יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> from me O LORD מֵעֲשֹׂ֣תִי <WH6213> that I should do זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise הֲדַ֤ם <WH1818> this [is not this] the blood הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> of the men הַהֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> that went בְּנַפְשׁוֹתָ֔ם <WH5315> any וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָבָ֖ה <WH14> would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֑ם <WH8354> not drink אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> it These things did שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <WH7969> these three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> mighty men ס

וַאֲבִישַׁ֞י <WH52> And Abishai אֲחִ֣י ׀ <WH251> the brother יוֹאָ֣ב <WH3097> of Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah ה֚וּא <WH1931> he רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> was chief [הַשְּׁלֹשִׁי כ] (הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7992> third part ק) וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> and he עוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5782> And he lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> חֲנִית֔וֹ <WH2595> his spear עַל־ <WH5921> against שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> against three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חָלָ֑ל <WH2491> [and] slew וְלוֹ־ שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> [them] and had the name בַּשְּׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> among three

מִן־ <WH4480> was most הַשְּׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> not unto the [first] three הֲכִ֣י <WH3588> for נִכְבָּ֔ד <WH3513> Was he not most honourable וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became לָהֶ֖ם לְשָׂ֑ר <WH8269> their commander וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> to the three לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָֽא׃ <WH935> howbeit he attained ס

וּבְנָיָ֨הוּ <WH1141> And Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֧ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> man [חַי כ] (חַ֛יִל <WH2416> age ק) רַב־ <WH7227> who had done many פְּעָלִ֖ים <WH6467> acts מִֽקַּבְצְאֵ֑ל <WH6909> of Kabzeel ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הִכָּ֗ה <WH5221> he slew אֵ֣ת <WH853> שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> two אֲרִאֵל֙ <WH739> lionlike men מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וְ֠הוּא <WH1931> he יָרַ֞ד <WH3381> he went down וְהִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> also and slew אֶֽת־ <WH853> [הָאֲרִיַּה כ] (הָאֲרִ֛י <WH738> lion ק) בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַבֹּ֖אר <WH953> of a pit בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in time הַשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <WH7950> of snow

וְהוּא־ <WH1931> He הִכָּה֩ <WH5221> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> man מִצְרִ֜י <WH4713> an Egyptian [אֲשֶׁר כ] (אִ֣ישׁ <WH834> after ק) מַרְאֶ֗ה <WH4758> a goodly וּבְיַ֤ד <WH3027> in his hand הַמִּצְרִי֙ <WH4713> and the Egyptian חֲנִ֔ית <WH2595> had a spear וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> but he went down אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him בַּשָּׁ֑בֶט <WH7626> to him with a staff וַיִּגְזֹ֤ל <WH1497> and plucked אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַחֲנִית֙ <WH2595> the spear מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand הַמִּצְרִ֔י <WH4713> out of the Egyptian's וַיַּהַרְגֵ֖הוּ <WH2026> And he slew בַּחֲנִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH2595> him with his own spear

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> These [things] did בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <WH1141> Benaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֑ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada וְלוֹ־ שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> and had the name בִּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> among three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> mighty men

מִן־ <WH4480> among הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> than the thirty נִכְבָּ֔ד <WH3513> He was more honourable וְאֶל־ <WH413> over הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> not to the [first] three לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֑א <WH935> but he attained וַיְשִׂמֵ֥הוּ <WH7760> set דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> over מִשְׁמַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4928> him over his guard ס

עֲשָׂה־ אֵ֥ל <WH6214> Asahel אֲחִֽי־ <WH251> the brother יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> of Joab בַּשְּׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <WH7970> [was] one of the thirty אֶלְחָנָ֥ן <WH445> Elhanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דֹּד֖וֹ <WH1734> of Dodo בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> of Bethlehem
שַׁמָּה֙ <WH8048> Shammah הַֽחֲרֹדִ֔י <WH2733> the Harodite אֱלִיקָ֖א <WH470> Elika הַחֲרֹדִֽי׃ <WH2733> the Harodite ס
חֶ֚לֶץ <WH2503> Helez הַפַּלְטִ֔י <WH6407> the Paltite עִירָ֥א <WH5896> Ira בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עִקֵּ֖שׁ <WH6142> of Ikkesh הַתְּקוֹעִֽי׃ <WH8621> the Tekoite ס
אֲבִיעֶ֙זֶר֙ <WH44> Abiezer הָֽעַנְּתֹתִ֔י <WH6069> the Anethothite מְבֻנַּ֖י <WH4012> Mebunnai הַחֻשָׁתִֽי׃ <WH2843> the Hushathite ס
צַלְמוֹן֙ <WH6756> Zalmon הָֽאֲחֹחִ֔י <WH266> the Ahohite מַהְרַ֖י <WH4121> Maharai הַנְּטֹפָתִֽי׃ <WH5200> the Netophathite ס
